noise: Microsoft announces new EU Data Boundary for Copilot, extending private cloud and on-premise deployment options for highly regulated sectors including healthcare.
translation: This isn't about new shiny toys. It means your existing Microsoft 365 Copilot licenses can now process sensitive EU pharma data without leaving your private cloud or on-premise infrastructure. The August 2026 EU AI Act enforcement is real; this offers a viable path to compliance for critical operations, moving beyond experimental sandbox usage.
action: I can help you audit your current Microsoft 365 AI usage and configure Copilot for GDPR-compliant, local-first execution on your existing data, focusing on regulatory affairs or clinical ops workflows, in 1-3 weeks.
